overview:
E - India Books ( A Unit Of Elbee Marketing)

eIndiaBooks is one of India’s leading suppliers of educational books on a variety of subjects like management, medical, engineering, business, computer science, mathematics, educational books for children and other life sciences. We have been dedicatedly catering to various universities, scholars, libraries, students, professionals, business firms etc. We always endeavor to bring highly informative books to satiate your inquisitiveness and intellectual taste.

With our comprehensive collection of books and efficient services we have succeeded in building up a vast customer base over the world. We provide best quality in shortest time period. In a short span of time our books have carved a niche for themselves in the domestic as well as international markets and are in great demand at some of the leading stores and companies.

The standard of books exported consists of large number of illustrations, examples, diagrams etc. to make the concept more clear to reader. Our range of books encompasses a plethora of subjects like management , engineering and an array of other books for all age groups.

Phone : +(91)-(11)-41511721
